long_description:
# Rotten Flesh to Leather Mod for MineClone 2

This is a mod for MineClone 2 to be able to craft leather. You need to craft a needle by 2 iron nugget.

![needle](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Elagoht/MineClone2RottenFleshToLeather/main/screenshots/needle.png)

After that you need 2 rotten flesh and 1 string to craft sewed flesh. 

![sewed flesh](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Elagoht/MineClone2RottenFleshToLeather/main/screenshots/sewed_flesh.png)

Finally you can cook that sewed flesh to get leather.

![leather](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Elagoht/MineClone2RottenFleshToLeather/main/screenshots/leather.png)
name: flesh2leather
short_description: Adds recipe to craft leather for MineClone2
title: Rotten Flesh To Leather
